lead_paragraph: Italy prop Martin Castrogiovanni has been suspended by his club Racing 92 after being pictured partying with Paris St Germain striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic in Las Vegas over the weekend.

headline.print_headline: Castrogiovanni Faces Racing Wrath for Partying With Zlatan
headline.main: Castrogiovanni Faces Racing Wrath for Partying With Zlatan

snippet: Italy prop Martin Castrogiovanni has been suspended by his club Racing 92 after being pictured partying with Paris St Germain striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic in Las Vegas over the weekend....
